column1: 312512,Mechanical Engineering Technician,,"Confer with technical staff to prepare designs or operational plans
column3: Estimate technical or resource requirements for development or production projects
column5: Fabricate products or components using machine tools
column7: Create graphical representations of mechanical equipment
column9: Review technical documents to plan work
column11: Document design or operational test results
column13: Test products for functionality or quality
column15: Test performance of electrical, electronic, mechanical, or integrated systems or equipment
column17: Monitor the productivity or efficiency of industrial operations
column21: Evaluate designs or specifications to ensure quality
column25: Recommend technical design or process changes to improve efficiency, quality or performance
